nodes.documentation:
Instrument v3 base contract.
A storage proxy is created for each issuance.
nodes.name: InstrumentV3
createIssuance
engageIssuance
processTokenDeposit
processTokenWithdraw
processCustomEvent
processScheduledEvent

nodes.documentation:
Instrument v3 base contract.
A storage proxy is created for each issuance.
nodes.name: InstrumentV3
createIssuance
engageIssuance
processTokenDeposit
processTokenWithdraw
processCustomEvent
processScheduledEvent

createIssuance(bytes,bytes).details: Create a new issuance of the financial instrument

params.makerParametersData: The custom parameters to the newly created issuance

createIssuance(bytes,bytes).return: updatedState The new state of the issuance.

engageIssuance(bytes,bytes).details: A taker engages to the issuance

params.takerParameters: The custom parameters to the new engagement

engageIssuance(bytes,bytes).return: updatedState The new state of the issuance.transfersData The transfers to perform after the invocation

params.eventName: The name of the custom event.
params.eventPayload: The custom parameters to the custom event

processCustomEvent(bytes,bytes32,bytes).return: updatedState The new state of the issuance.updatedData The updated data of the issuance.transfersData The transfers to perform after the invocation

params.eventName: The name of the custom event.
params.eventPayload: The custom parameters to the custom event

processScheduledEvent(bytes,bytes32,byte.return: updatedState The new state of the issuance.updatedData The updated data of the issuance.transfersData The transfers to perform after the invocation

processTokenDeposit(bytes,address,uint25.details: An account has made an ERC20 token deposit to the issuance

params.amount: The amount of ERC20 token to deposit.
params.tokenAddress: The address of the ERC20 token to deposit.

processTokenDeposit(bytes,address,uint25.return: updatedState The new state of the issuance.updatedData The updated data of the issuance.transfersData The transfers to perform after the invocation

processTokenWithdraw(bytes,address,uint2.details: An account has made an ERC20 token withdraw from the issuance

params.amount: The amount of ERC20 token to withdraw.
params.tokenAddress: The address of the ERC20 token to withdraw.

processTokenWithdraw(bytes,address,uint2.return: updatedState The new state of the issuance.updatedData The updated data of the issuance.transfersData The transfers to perform after the invocation

userdoc.notice: Instrument v3 base contract. A storage proxy is created for each issuance.
